#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t,i,j,k,l,m,n,o;
	cin>>t;
	for(i=0;i<t;i++)
	{
		cin>>j;
		o=0;
		cin>>m;
		o+=m;
		n=m;
		k=m;
		for(l=1;l<j;l++)
		{
			cin>>m;
			o+=m;
			n^=m;
			if(m<k)
				k=m;
		}
		if(n!=0)
			cout<<"NO"<<endl;
		else
			cout<<o-k<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
